Class PlayerView

java.lang.Object
view.PlayerView
public class PlayerView extends Object
Renders the player entity on the screen. This class handles loading player animations from sprite sheets, selecting the appropriate animation based on the player's current state (e.g., running, idle, jumping), and managing the timing for frame updates to create fluid motion.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    PlayerView()
    Constructs a PlayerView and loads all necessary player animation assets.

  • Method Details

    • draw

      public void draw(Graphics g, Player player, GameState gameState)
      Draws the player character on the screen.
      Parameters:
      g - The Graphics context to draw on.
      player - The player data object.
      gameState - The current state of the game, used to determine if animations should update.
